pullRequest.title: fix(TDI-44568): Update Apache POI version in components

nodes.bodyText:
I see that some of the poi jar with "_modified_talend" have been replace with offical poi jar.
https://github.com/Talend/tdi-studio-se/blob/ba747020ec0669c31d82c4fd02d2c1fa104343c0/main/plugins/org.talend.designer.components.localprovider/components/tFileInputExcel/REAME_MODIFICATION_TALEND.txt
do you means those modification have been include in offical poi jar ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -177,20 +177,24 @@
 	<CODEGENERATION>
 		<IMPORTS>
 			<IMPORT NAME="Java_Excel" MODULE="jxl.jar" MVN="mvn:org.talend.libraries/jxl/6.0.0"  UrlPath="platform:/plugin/org.talend.libraries.jexcel/lib/jxl.jar" REQUIRED_IF="(VERSION_2007 == 'false')" />
-
+			<IMPORT NAME="simpleexcel" MODULE="simpleexcel-2.3-20200806.jar" MVN="mvn:org.talend.libraries/simpleexcel/2.3-20200806" UrlPath="platform:/plugin/org.talend.libraries.excel/lib/simpleexcel-2.3-20200806.jar" REQUIRED_IF="(VERSION_2007 == 'true') AND GENERATION_MODE == 'EVENT_MODE')" />

-			<IMPORT NAME="poi" MODULE="poi-4.1.0-20190523141255_modified_talend.jar" MVN="mvn:org.apache.poi/poi/4.1.0-20190523141255_modified_talend" UrlPath="platform:/plugin/org.talend.libraries.excel/lib/poi-4.1.0-20190523141255_modified_talend.jar" REQUIRED_IF="(VERSION_2007 == 'true')" />
